Drinks.name: Hendrick's Breakfast Martini
Drinks.description: 1.5 oz Hendrick's Gin, 2 tsp Orange marmalade, .75 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup. Garnish: 1 Lemon Peel Glass: Cocktail

Drinks.name: Dry Martini
Drinks.description: The Dry Martini is a classic cocktail that, like a tailored suit, is timeless. Although the original of the tipple is unclear, the Dry Martini has maintained a place in cocktail history due to being easy to use and endlessly sophisticated. Elegant for the fancy and boozy for the heavy-handed.

Drinks.name: 1942 Martini
Drinks.description: A really good tequila can make a really good Martini, if you don't believe you gottat try this 1942 and convince yourself.

Drinks.name: Black Pepper Gibson
Drinks.description: 4oz of Dry vermouth garnished with black-pepper-and-onion making this classic drink a savory delight.

Drinks.name: You Name it Martini
Drinks.description: Ask for any combination you would like to try, go for the craziest ingredients

Drinks.name: Cuba Libre
Drinks.description: Perfect match between rum and coke, lots of ice and a bit of lime.

Drinks.name: Mojito
Drinks.description: White rum with fresh icy mint.

Drinks.name: Tequila a lo Macho
Drinks.description: Our house finest tequila de la casa, solo para los meros meros machos!
